des:
The iSmart Light Skill offers users a convenient way to control iSmart light bulb 

To connect your iSmart light to the Alexa Skill, first use the iSmart Light App to connect your devices to the internet. Then open the Alexa App to find the iSmart Light Skill, enter the Skill and click the "ENABLE" button. The authentication page will pop up. Enter the username and password of the iSmart Light App. On completion, click Discover on your device. Alternatively you can say "Discover" to Alexa. After discovering the device, you will find the your iSmart light device name in Alexa App.

You can now control your iSmart light bulb (name RGBCW Bulb)by speaking the following phrases to Alexa:
"Alexa, turn on the RGBCW Bulb."
"Alexa, turn off the RGBCW Bulb ."
"Alexa, set the RGBCW Bulb to red."
"Alexa, set the RGBCW Bulb to blue."
"Alexa, set the RGBCW Bulb to green."
"Alexa, set the RGBCW Bulb to yellow."
"Alexa, set the RGBCW Bulb to orange."
"Alexa, set the RGBCW Bulb to violet."
"Alexa, set the RGBCW Bulb to fifty percent."
"Alexa, make the RGBCW Bulb warm white."
"Alexa, dim the RGBCW Bulb ."
"Alexa, brighten the RGBCW Bulb."

You can check with your local reseller how to integrate the Alexa in you Home Manager system.
